name: TheWeatherNetworkNationalForecast(Canada)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Follow the latest National Weather Network Forecast with Alexa's Flash Briefing.

After enabling the skill, ask Alexa for your flash briefing, to get your in-depth weather forecast and analysis wherever you live, work and play.

Under settings in your Alexa app, once you find the flash briefing, you can move The Weather Network Forecast to the top of your news briefing list.

New: Now you can watch The Weather Network Forecast on your Echo Spot or Echo Show!

Your weather when it really matters, The Weather Network.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
